item.title: New publication on ETS emissions in EU financial regulation
item.description: Last month I published my first actual article in a peer reviewed journal in 8 years: "All over the place: ETS emission allowances in EU financial regulaton,TRV-RPS 2024/1, 5-28. In the article I provide a general overview of rules and obligations applicable to market participants that wish to hold or trade allowances - taking into account the recent updates of the Emissions Trading System. This overview demonstrates that the common thread of allowances-specific rules is a plethora of information and reporting requirements.

item.title: ESMA MiCA consultations on reverse solicitation and qualification of instruments: interesting reads
item.description: The new ESMA consultations on reverse solicitation in the context of MiCA and the qualification of instruments as financial instruments vs. crypto assets are interesting reads, even if only because they basically give a read-up on the status of reverse enquiry and definition(s) of mifid financial instruments in general (in particular on the concept of ’transferable securities’).
